quick_answer.text: A Dunkin Donuts Boston Kreme donut contains 290 calories, with 36g carbs and 4g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Dunkin Donuts Boston Kreme donut?
What are the carbs in a Dunkin Boston Kreme donut?
faqs.a: About 36g total carbs, including 1g fiber and 14g sugars.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a Boston Kreme donut from Dunkin?
